Class UserActivityModel

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp.UserActivityModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
iReadAndWriteToFile
public class UserActivityModel extends Object implements iReadAndWriteToFile
On quit, save user activity to JSON file.
